item.description:
Join us at Zachary & Nora's home for a buffet of autumn soups. We'll spend the evening making them, and then eating them. New members are certainly welcome to join us! This might be a good chance to pre-make your soup course for next week's big holiday meal.

---------------

P.S. If you would like to, please bring in canned goods to any event this November to give to Zachary or Nora. At the end of the month we will be donating these goods to the Greater Boston Food Bank on behlaf of the Boston Atheists.
item.name: Soup Buffet
